DOC.brief_summary: Our aim was to evaluate the efficacy of examining endometrial biopsy specimens for nerve fibers as a diagnostic test for endometriosis and endometrioma in a double-blind comparison with diagnostic laparoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Biopsy as Diagnostic Method for Endometriosis and Endometrioma
DOC.criteria: Women in the reproductive age group undergoing laparoscopy for pelvic pain and/or infertility, and not currently receiving hormonal treatment for at least 3 months prior to laparoscopy will be included in the study
